short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension scrapes youtube links from a web page and creates a link that will combine these videos into a playlist.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is great to use on reddit to build a playlist out of the many youtube links in order to connect to chromecast
